scenario_text.value:
Hey, Takuma!
I heard a voice inside the shrine!

It might be one of those monsters.
Let’s check it out, but be careful.

We’re going inside that?
We’ll be eaten alive...

If Saki and the others are inside, we need to
help them! Let’s go!

Yeah, okay...
It’s over here, come on!
Ngh...

Hey, it’s the professor!
He’s all right?!
I wouldn’t exactly call him “all right”!

What happened? It looks like he’s been beaten
up and he’s collapsed...

Hey, wait a second...
There’s something around him...
You’re right! He’s surrounded!

Are they enemies?!
Whoa, I think one just looked this way.
Whoops, it’s because I shouted so loudly...

Naw, I think we would’ve been spotted either
way.

The question is: Are they good guys or bad
guys?

And can they even talk like Falcomon or
Agumon?
What’s their deal...?

Hey, what gives? Is this old guy still
breathing?

Who knows? And really, who cares?
We’d better report back to Fangmon...

(It talked!? Are there others that can talk?
And what is Fangmon?)
Hey... They’re talking. They can talk!
(Minoru’s gonna go talk to them?!)
(What should I do?!)
Don’t let him go!
Leave it to him.
Go with him!

Wait—hold up! You’re not gonna go talk to
them, are you? They could be dangerous!

If they can talk, it’ll all work out.
Watch and learn!
Okay. It’s all you. Just be safe!

Stop worrying!
I’m good at this, remember?

You’re going alone? That’s too risky!
I’ll go with you!

That’ll scare them.
And we don’t know if there’s more.

Well, just step in if I need help.
I’m going for now.

Um, hi there!
We come in peace!
Huh? Who’s this windbag?
Clear out, punk.
Urk... These guys are bad all over...

Uhh, well y’see, fellas...
I figured we could be friends, yeah?

Hmm... This might be a lost cause, even for
a negotiator like Minoru...

...I don’t like this, Takuma.
I don’t think they’re the talking type.

Leave the coot. It’s those human brats we’re
after.

Yeah, where’d they run off to?
...Hey. Hold on a sec.
Don’t we got a brat right here...?

Uh oh! They were ignoring Minoru until now,
but now they’re all suddenly looking at him!

Huh? Oh, uh...
Not good...
Perrrfect, all we gotta do is grab this one!

Let’s rough him up a bit so he doesn’t try
and run off...

Hey!
They’re getting closer!
What? There’re more at the exit?

(What is this voice I hear?
Just listening makes my blood freeze!)
Watch out!

The monster that’s howling is invisible!
It’s a really dangerous one...

Invisible?!
Then what’re we supposed to do?
He’s not even looking at us! Some nerve...
Hey, Minoru! Look out!
Uwaaah!

Hyah!
I won’t let you lay a finger on him!
Falcomon!
Huh?! And who invited you?!
Now, Minoru! Make your escape!

Why you—!
Siding with a human, are you?!

Naw, I bet you just want the human’s power
for yourself!

We won’t let you have it!
Take this!
Ugh...!
Falcomon!
Oh no, Falcomon took a hit for Minoru!
Not...not a problem!
This is bad. Those guys are out for blood!
Let’s go, Agumon!
Yeah!

It’s now or never!
Let’s fight with everyone, Labramon!
Yes, let’s do this!
